item.description:
'Let's go back for the newest game in town at Bleacher Bar, Trivia + Bingo = Trivingo. ' Two classic games combined to form an exciting, nonstop, group game. Jeff, the game host has also promised a free beer to last week's drinking buddies who gave an email to which he will send a notice which must be printed and presented.

 

The last time both our teams, creamed the competition, proving we were the smahtest teams in the room.  We won a $50 gift card, 3 pairs of Sox Monster tickets, a pair of Bruins tickets and Bleacher Bar tshirts. Let's bring more teams so we can make another clean sweep.

 

ADMISSION IS FREE AND THERE IS NO COST TO PLAY TRIVINGO 

YOU MUST BE AT LEAST 21 AND PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

 

Trivingo begins at 8:00 PM but you're welcome to arrive when you can and stay as long as you're able. You'll find us at the bar or ask the hostess or bartender to direct you to the Happy Hour Meetup crew.

If you're interested in joining a team...please answer the question which appears after you RSVP.

If you come hungry, here's the food and beer menu. There is also a special bucket of ponys for $20 in addition to a respectable assortment of bottled beer as well as on draft.

Bleacher Bar is unique because it is located beneath the Fenway Park bleachers in center field. There's a window which has a great view through centerfield into the park, it is the only view of its kind.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Nearest subway station Kenmore on the Green Line, which is about a ten (10) minute walk.
item.why: Fun Fun Fun Good time under the bleachers
item.name: Trivingo Happy Hour on Thursday February 3rd 7:30 PM
